name: Care Packages
description: Italian Community Services extends care and warmth to seniors through Care Packages. They distribute care packages for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas to ensure that their community feels cherished and supported. They invite corporate sponsors to engage volunteer teams in creating and delivering these packages, while local business sponsors can contribute packaged goods to make each care package a heartfelt gesture of love and community.
